text: I argue that the semantic principles of Tarskian logic allow any higher order mathematical predicate or relation to function as a logical term in a 1st - order system , provided it is introduced in the right way into the syntactic - semantic apparatus . ; Formally , I propose a new , " constructive " , semantic characterization of logical terms .
